data.message: Hey why don't you make a rap of us latinos I am sure it will make a hit but that’s my opinion only . . .  You can include this asshole of Donald Trumpt to make it bigger ! Thats just my opinion. It don't have to be about us latinos. But just make a rap about that mother fucker being a racist against latinos , and I am sure it would be a a hit. Whit your talent !!!!!  It would be hit because I know Latino people admire your music just think about it please it is about time that us latinos have a powerful voice it would help a lot if you can make a rap about us please.
